activities: Marden-Kane Inc is a digital marketing and promotions agency that develops and executes sweepstakes, contest and games for our client internationally. This involves collecting, transmitting and processing personal information from consumers who enter these promotions and processing required tax data for these individuals as required by law. Additional data collected and transmitted may include employee and client personal data.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: organization, client, customer data both offline, on-line, manually processed data, and human resources data
